examples: I'm not a very good correspondent, I'm afraid.

Our correspondent in South Africa sent this report.
He spent his time in the army as a correspondent for service newspapers.

A correspondent in the Middle East bureau just filed a new report on the coup.
example_translate: К сожалению, письма я пишу не очень хорошо.
